summary: Replaces texture of the eyes in game
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/7963/eyeseyeseyes.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=Gray][size=6]Description:[/size][/color]
Once again, greetings to all! This texture pack will replace all eyes (almost))). Mod a few specific, so not 
everyone will like my colors... And it\'s normal.

[list][b]Includes:[/b]
[*]argonian eyes
[*]khajiit eyes
[*]dark elf eyes
[*]wood elf eyes
[*]high elf eyes
[*]orc eyes
[*]human eyes
[*]vampire eyes, also Includes wolf and beast eyes
[/list]
At your discretion I made 4 type of installation:
#1 variant - all covereyes texture and improved vanilla eyelashes
#2 variant/#3 variant/#4 variant - the same covereyes texture but different eyelashes (see the screenshots)
You can also combine them)

[youtube]LOUPjU-BUsI[/youtube]
Much thx [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3166292]Arsenalrobert[/url] for this video)) 



[list][color=Gray][size=6]Installation:[/size][/color]
[*]Extract the files
[*]Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)
[*]Enjoy (or maybe not)))
[/list]


[color=Gray][size=6]Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
Remove the following folder:
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes



[color=Gray][size=6]Compatibility:[/size][/color]
I created it under [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]my mod[/url], however this does not prevent you combine it with other resources)) so I don\'t see 
any problems about it. 



[color=Gray][size=6]Credits:[/size][/color]
Please ask me before using a mod for their own purposes.

Much thanks to Bethesda!

I hope you enjoy my mod. With pleasure I will watch the reincarnation of your characters))
[color=Steelblue][size=3]...Thanks for your attention and happy new year!..[/size][/color]


[center][img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/4381/eyeseyeseyes2.jpg[/img][/center]
author: mrLenski
